shortdesc.ph: Callback when an extension error occurs.

p.codeblock: final void Function(ExtensionContext context, int error, String message)? onExtensionErrorWithContext;
public virtual void OnExtensionErrorWithContext(ExtensionContext context, int error, string message){}

section.p: When enabling the extension fails or the extension runs into an error, this callback is triggered and reports the error code and reason.
When plugin enabling fails or the plugin encounters a runtime error, the plugin triggers this callback and reports the error code and reason.
If enabling the extension fails or the extension encounters a runtime error, it triggers this callback to report the error code and reason.
This callback is triggered when enabling the extension fails or the extension encounters a runtime error, reporting the error code and reason.

plentry.pd: Error code. See the documentation provided by the extension provider.
Error reason. See the documentation provided by the extension provider.
Error code. See the plugin documentation provided by the plugin provider.
Error reason. See the plugin documentation provided by the plugin provider.
Error code. See the documentation provided by the extension provider.
Error reason. See the documentation provided by the extension provider.
Error code. See the plugin documentation provided by the extension provider.
Error reason. See the plugin documentation provided by the extension provider.
